roleset.name: to hold back

example.name: gerund
example.text: The sole sympathetic character is the prodigal daughter Kate ( Jaclyn Smith ) , and she is tolerable only by virtue of having nothing in common with her kinfolk , a truly benighted pack of Southern Protestants whose grim existence consists mostly of [*PRO*] growing peaches and repressing sex .

roleset.note: Based on WSJ. Member of Vncls concealment-16, subjugate-42.3.
